item.title: Michael's Blog: Recapture the Wonder
item.description: He who did not spare his own Son but gave him up for us all, how will he not also with him graciously give us all things? (Romans 8:32 ESV) A whole bloc of theological teaching through the centuries has basically promoted something quite contrary to the above revolutionary verse. This popular thinking basically leaves us with this powerful impression: "Because the Father sent Jesus to die on the cross to forgive us for our sins and take us to heaven if and/or when we die, we really don't need anything else...nor should we rightly expect anything else...from Him." Have you ever gotten this impression in the past as I have?

item.title: Michael Sullivant Pastor, Author, Speaker, Radius Director
